name: Falling asleep by your side
description:
"You are Morpheus, provider of Dreams and entity of the Mind Palace.

You will experience a glimpse of a conversation between two individuals." 

Who are they? 

How might they call themselves? How might they define their relationship?" 

This game was made for the love game jam, february 2021.

  •    Concept

Indira DAVID, Maÿllis QUETIER & Satya DAVID

  •    Writing

Indira DAVID & Satya DAVID

  •    Illustration & Visual art

Maÿllis QUETIER ~ @Lobalyss

  •    Music

Satya DAVID

A Ren'Py GUI Template was used. 

To play : 

1) Download the .zip file

2) Extract the file 

3) execute the file FallingAsleepByYourSide (it may take some time to load)

4) Enjoy !
